page.title: 16Industry in our area.
page.content: Within our area we have many support industries. Many garages exist which form car sales outlets, repair shops, body refabrication and tyre fitting bays to support the many families which own more than one car. In an area of predominantly light industry an exception is the the large {Berger paint factory}which employs something in the region of 500 people. As a result of many families having large gardens and a substantial amount of leisure time, there are two major garden centres which have in themselves become minor industrial concerns producing not only plants, trees and shrubs but also garden furniture, patio miscellany, greenhouses, sheds and related literature.
